TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Parameter extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public Class Parameter Implements ICloneable, IStateManager
public ref class Parameter : ICloneable, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type Parameter = class interface ICloneable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 为数据源控件提供一个绑定到应用程序变量、用户标识和选择以及其他数据的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism that data source controls use to bind to application variables, user identities and choices, and other data.

summary.span: 作为所有 ASP.NET 参数类型的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET parameter types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的参数化 SQL 查询的筛选表达式中的参数或 ASP.NET 数据源控件的业务对象方法调用用于选择、 筛选或修改数据。The class represents a parameter in a parameterized SQL query, a filtering expression, or a business object method call that an ASP.NET data source control uses to select, filter, or modify data. 对象包含在一个 对象中。 objects are contained in a object. 在运行时，将绑定到数据源控件使用任何方法与数据交互它们表示的变量的值进行计算的对象。 objects are evaluated at run time, to bind the values of the variables they represent to whatever method is used by a data source control to interact with data. 使用派生的类与数据源和数据绑定控件生成基于 Web 的数据应用程序。Use classes that derive from with data source and data-bound controls to build Web-based data applications. 这些参数类由数据源控件中用于绑定特定类型的 Web 应用程序中的 SQL 查询字符串、 业务对象方法参数，和的详细信息的占位符中找到的值。These parameter classes are used by data source controls to bind specific kinds of values found in Web applications to placeholders in SQL query strings, business object method parameters, and more. 下表列出了在 ASP.NET 中包含的参数类型。The following table lists parameter types that are included in ASP.NET. ||| |-|-| ||将绑定的 Web 服务器控件的任何公共属性。Binds any public property of a Web server control.| ||将绑定窗体字段。Binds a form field.| ||绑定会话状态字段。Binds a session-state field.| ||将路由 URL 参数绑定。Binds a route URL parameter.| ||将 cookie 字段绑定。Binds a cookie field.| ||将绑定的查询字符串参数。Binds a query-string parameter.| ||将绑定的配置文件字段。Binds a profile field.| 扩展基本类时您想要实现自己的自定义参数类型。Extend the base class when you want to implement your own custom parameter types. 对象是非常简单： 它们具有和一个属性，可以以声明方式表示和可以跟踪跨多个 HTTP 请求的状态。 objects are very simple: they have a and a property, can be represented declaratively, and can track state across multiple HTTP requests. 所有参数都支持属性，当一个参数绑定到一个值，但计算的值时`null`在运行时。All parameters support a property, for cases when a parameter is bound to a value, but the value evaluates to `null` at run time. 使用的集合时对象与数据源控件，在集合中的其顺序可能重要。When using a collection of objects with a data source control, their order in the collection might matter. 有关如何使用参数的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SqlDataSource 控件使用的参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)并[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information on how parameters are used, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295) and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用所选的值W 中的控制`here`SQL 查询子句。The following example shows how to use the selected value of a control in the W`here` clause of a SQL query. 该示例使用类，该类派生自类。The example uses the class, which derives from the class. 元素具有一个名为参数定义查询"@Title"，将值从`DropDownList1`应转。The element defines the query with a parameter named "@Title" where the value from `DropDownList1` should go. 元素指定"@Title"的值将替换为占位符属性的`DropDownList1`控件。The element specifies that the "@Title" placeholder will be replaced by the value of the property of the `DropDownList1` control. 元素添加到的集合控件。The element is added to the collection of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例类似于前一个，但使用代码而不是标记。The following example is like the previous one, but uses code instead of markup. 首次加载页面时控件具有没有所选的值，并属性的使用对象。When the page loads the first time, the control has no selected value, and the property of the object is used. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/CS/param1acs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/VB/param1avb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码在前面的示例演示页代码隐藏类。The following code shows the code-behind class for the page in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/CS/param1acs.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/VB/param1avb.aspx.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类，以创建可由数据源控件和数据绑定方案中的其他控件的新参数类型。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a new parameter type that can be used by data source controls and other controls in data-binding scenarios. 可以使用数据源控件`StaticParameter`Web 窗体页上声明的参数来绑定到任何对象，通常为字符串的值。A data source control can use a `StaticParameter` parameter to bind to the value of any object, typically a string, declared on a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置参数的数据库类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the database type of the parameter.
The database type of the instance.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用数据库类型来创建强类型化的参数，以便你的 Web 应用程序和基础代码或数据库表中的值之间的值正确转换。The database type can be used to create strongly typed parameters, so that values are converted correctly between your Web application and underlying code or values from database tables. 如果通过设置更改参数的数据库类型属性，调用方法。If the database type of the parameter is changed by setting the property, the method is called.

exception.span: 尝试将此属性设置为 枚举值以外的值。

summary.span: 指定参数的默认值（如果调用 方法时参数绑定到的值未被初始化）。

span.span: Specifies a default value for the parameter, should the value that the parameter is bound to be uninitialized when the method is called.

value.span: 一个字符串，当 绑定到的值无法解析或者未初始化时，该字符串作为参数对象的默认值。

span.span: A string that serves as a default value for the when the value it is bound to cannot be resolved or is uninitialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性适用于的方案在参数绑定到一个值，但值很`null`时无法解析或对象的评估结果。The property is used in scenarios where the parameter is bound to a value, but the value is `null` or cannot be resolved when the object is evaluated. 如果参数的属性更改，调用方法。If the property of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索单个数据记录使用控件并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a single data record using an control and display it in a control. 控件中检索特定员工记录通过调用`GetEmployee`方法的`EmployeeLogic`类。The control retrieves a specific employee record by calling the `GetEmployee` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. `GetEmployee`方法需要员工 ID 参数。The `GetEmployee` method requires an employee ID parameter. 控件使用对象中其集合，以将 ID 传递到`GetEmployee`在此示例中的方法。The control uses a object in its collection to pass an ID to the `GetEmployee` method in this example. 若要查看的实现示例`EmployeeLogic`类和`GetEmployee`方法，请参阅类概述。To view the example implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class and the `GetEmployee` method, see the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/CS/objds3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/VB/objds3vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::ParameterDirection Direction { System::Data::ParameterDirection get(); void set(System::Data::ParameterDirection value); };
member this.Direction : System.Data.ParameterDirection with get, set

summary.span: 指示 对象是否用于将值绑定到控件，或者是否可以使用控件更改值。

span.span: Indicates whether the object is used to bind a value to a control, or the control can be used to change the value.
One of the values.

value.span: 默认情况下， 设置为 。

span.span: is set to by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性当前不由类，这是保留供将来使用。The property is currently not used by the class and is reserved for future use. 属性描述值之间的数据流的方向，实例绑定到和对象本身。The property describes the direction of the flow of data between the value that a instance is bound to and the object itself. 默认值为属性， ，介绍最常见的方案的数据流都按一个方向： 向其值从对象绑定到对象。The default value for the property, , describes the most common scenario where the flow of data is always in one direction: from the value to which the object is bound to the object. 对基础值进行任何更改都会反映由对象，但对的任何更改对象也不会反映基础数据。Any changes made to the underlying value are reflected by the object, but any changes to the object are not reflected by the underlying data. 可以设置属性设置为或时使用输出参数或时使用的存储过程的返回值。You can set the property to or when working with output parameters, or when working with a return value from a stored procedure. 如果参数的属性更改，调用方法。If the property of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置， ，并的属性对象时将它们用作输出参数和返回值与存储过程的参数。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , and properties of objects when using them as output parameters and return value parameters with a stored procedure. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现方法将返回`null`在所有情况下。The default implementation of the method is to return `null` in all cases. 派生的类类重写方法来返回更新后的参数的值。Classes that derive from the class override the method to return an updated parameter value. 例如，返回它所绑定到控件的值对象虽然对象检索当前的名称/值对从对象。For example, the object returns the value of the control that it is bound to, while the object retrieves the current name/value pair from the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以返回正确的值派生自的类中类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to return the correct value in a class that is derived from the class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. span.span: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 此方法将还原的视图状态信息中保存的上一个页请求对象方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置参数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the parameter.
The name of the parameter.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象不需要有一个名称;但是，数据源控件可能会使用参数名称匹配使用 SQL 查询或业务方法签名中的参数集合中的对象。 objects are not required to have a name; however, data source controls might use the parameter name to match a object in a collection with a parameter in a SQL query or business method signature. 例如，控件可以使用的名称相匹配的参数化 SQL 查询中的占位符的对象。For example, the control can use the name of the object to match a placeholder in a parameterized SQL query. 同样，控件可以使用的名称对象中集合以匹配中的占位符属性。Similarly, the control can use the name of a object in the collection to match a placeholder in the property. 在某些情况下，不使用的名称和顺序对象添加到集合是更重要的。In some cases, the name is not used and the order in which the object is added to a collection is more important. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 SqlDataSource 控件使用的参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)并[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295) and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 如果更改参数的名称，调用方法。If the name of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据中间层业务对象中检索数据的控件和一个控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 代码示例组成控件，控件，控件和一个提交按钮。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a Submit button. 默认情况下使用其中一个的名称填充控件`Northwind`员工。By default, the control is populated with the name of one of the `Northwind` employees. 控件将显示有关中的名称所标识的雇员信息控件。The control displays information about the employee identified by the name in the control. 若要检索有关另一个雇员的数据，请输入中的雇员的完整名称控件，然后单击该按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the control and click the button. 属性指定一个表达式，用于筛选数据来检索属性。The property specifies an expression used to filter the data retrieved by the property. 它使用到中包含的参数进行求值的参数占位符集合。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符受单引号会因为参数类型是字符串类型，可能会包含空格。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型为数值或日期类型，不需要引号。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not needed. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分属性的类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnParameterChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 调用包含 对象的 集合的 方法。

span.span: Calls the method of the collection that contains the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含对象集合中，使用调用方法不起作用。If the object is not contained by a collection, calling the method has no effect. 如果对象是否包含由集合，引发事件的集合。If the object is contained by a collection, raises the event of the collection. 如果集合包含由数据源控件，事件引发的数据源控件导致任何数据绑定控件重新绑定的事件。If the collection is contained by a data source control, the event raises the data source control's event, causing any data-bound controls to rebind. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法来引发事件参数的状态更改时。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to raise the event when the state of a parameter changes. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#7)]

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
abstract member SaveViewState : unit -> obj override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 自页回发到服务器开始，将更改保存到 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object's view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与此对象关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是累积的服务器控件的属性的值。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后将保留到字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象返回到客户端为存储在对应的 HTML 中的变量`hidden`元素。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element. 当你创作的自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的提高效率属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property.

The type of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类型来创建强类型化的参数，以便你的 Web 应用程序和基础代码之间的值正确转换。The type can be used to create strongly typed parameters, so that values are converted correctly between your Web application and underlying code. 如果更改参数的类型，则调用方法。If the type of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置， ，并的属性对象时将它们用作输出参数和返回值与存储过程的参数。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , and properties of objects when using them as output parameters and return value parameters with a stored procedure. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含 对象的视图状态信息的 的实例。

span.span: An instance of that contains the object's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的视图状态是所有其属性值的累计。A parameter's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要在 HTTP 请求间保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性，它是一个实例的类中，以存储属性值。To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 该值作为传递变量到对应的 HTML`hidden`输入的元素时来处理后续请求。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML `hidden` input element when subsequent requests are processed. 默认情况下，为所有服务器控件启用视图状态。View state is enabled for all server controls by default. 有关字典和如何使用它们的详细信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用视图状态对象将参数对象状态存储在一个类以扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the view-state object to store parameter object state in a class that extends the class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#5)]
